name: Worm Hole Mayhen
description:
The most unimaginable scenario happened! An astronaut is lost in the middle of space, with only his laser weapon and his vortex bomb launcher. So far normal for an astronaut, but our astronaut has a very peculiar detail: he has tripophobia !!

Knowing of his fear, space earthworms are taking away his sleep by creating several earthworm holes around him! Our friend can not even look at them for long without doing harm to himself!

Help our little friend get rid of this trouble! Kill all the worms! But be careful! Look at them and their holes for a long time can do you very bad !!!

Staff:
Design:

  • Alessandro Nunes
  • Mauro Oliveira

Programming:
